alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; Lower Washington County; San Rafael Swell; Sevier Valley; South Central Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Western Canyonlands; Western Millard and Juab Counties; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 21 at 2:37PM MDT until October 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Sevier Valley, San Rafael Swell, Upper Sevier River Valleys, Bryce Canyon Country, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity, Western Canyonlands and Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell, Western Millard and Juab Counties. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to midnight MDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects including Halloween decorations.
